product_name: Woods Rendezvous Sleeping Bag - Double - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The hunting-style Woods Rendezvous Sleeping Bag fits 2 adults and features a rugged canvas shell, synthetic insulation and a warm flannel lining for comfort to about 10degF on car-camping trips. Synthetic insulation and cozy flannel lining. Rectangular shape with hood to improve heat retention. Zippers on each side. Closeout.
short_description: The hunting-style Woods Rendezvous Sleeping Bag fits 2 adults and features a rugged canvas shell, synthetic insulation and a warm flannel lining for comfort to about 10degF on car-camping trips.
